description: This is documentation for AWS CloudHSM Classic. For more information, see AWS CloudHSM Classic FAQs, the AWS CloudHSM Classic User Guide, and the AWS CloudHSM Classic API Reference. For information about the current version of AWS CloudHSM, see AWS CloudHSM, the AWS CloudHSM User Guide, and the AWS CloudHSM API Reference. Retrieves information about an HSM. You can identify the HSM by its ARN or its serial number.

nested_items.name: HsmArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the HSM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the HSM.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: Contains additional information about the status of the HSM.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone that the HSM is in.

nested_items.name: EniId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the elastic network interface (ENI) attached to the HSM.

nested_items.name: EniIp
nested_items.description: The IP address assigned to the HSM's ENI.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of subscription for the HSM.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionStartDate
nested_items.description: The subscription start date.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionEndDate
nested_items.description: The subscription end date.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC that the HSM is in.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the subnet that the HSM is in.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role assigned to the HSM.

nested_items.name: SerialNumber
nested_items.description: The serial number of the HSM.

nested_items.name: VendorName
nested_items.description: The name of the HSM vendor.

nested_items.name: HsmType
nested_items.description: The HSM model type.

nested_items.name: SoftwareVersion
nested_items.description: The HSM software version.

nested_items.name: SshPublicKey
nested_items.description: The public SSH key.

nested_items.name: SshKeyLastUpdated
nested_items.description: The date and time that the SSH key was last updated.

nested_items.name: ServerCertUri
nested_items.description: The URI of the certificate server.

nested_items.name: ServerCertLastUpdated
nested_items.description: The date and time that the server certificate was last updated.

nested_items.name: Partitions
nested_items.description: The list of partitions on the HSM.
(string) ---
